column4: the password will be encrypted anyway, although nothing stops you from mounting the disk partitions

ok, here's the thing.  i'm a redhat guy.  i'm totally familiar with the mechanics of booting a system into single-user to recover a password, off a boot disk, whatever.  and i do suppose thats the route i ought to go...
...i'm just wondering if there's a more "ubuntu" way to go abou this.
